item.title: An R script for calculating the reading time of an R Markdown file
item.description: Reading time: 2 minute(s) @ 200 WPM. To see how we just did that, read on. Because psychological research tells us that including estimated reading times can increase reader engagement with digital content, I decided to include reading times for my riveting posts. So I wrote a simple R script. Here it is: bytes <- file.size("2017-05-15-an-r-script-for-calculating-reading-time-of-an-article.Rmd") words <- bytes/10 minutes <- words/200 The script is very simple, such that even I could program it.
